sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均可表示"海，海洋"之意。
means: sea ： 普通用词，可用复数形式表单数意义。sea所指的面积要比ocean小得多。sea也可是ocean的一部分。
ocean ： 指把海作为一个整体，是海洋的总称，不可数名词，指大洋时是可数名词。

word_mean: sea-land breeze 由于海面和陆地之间的昼夜热力差异而引起白天由海面吹向陆地称“海风(sea breeze)”、夜间由陆地吹向海面称“陆风(land breeze)”。
sea-level pressure  由本站气压推算到平均海平面上的气压值。
urchin paste 海胆生殖腺经腌制发酵的糊状制品。

entry.def: The sea is the salty water that covers about three-quarters of the earth's surface.

example.ex: Most of the kids have never seen the sea...
All transport operations, whether by sea, rail or road, are closely monitored at all times.
example.tran: 所有的交通活动，无论是通过海路、铁路还是公路，都时刻受到密切监视。

entry.def: You use seas when you are describing the sea at a particular time or in a particular area.

example.ex: He drowned after 30 minutes in the rough seas...
example.tran: 他在汹涌的海浪中挣扎了 30 分钟后淹死了。

example.ex: The seas are warm further south.
example.tran: 海水的温度越往南越高。

entry.def: A sea is a large area of salty water that is part of an ocean or is surrounded by land.

example.tran: 图尔卡纳浩瀚的内陆海

entry.def: A sea of people or things is a very large number of them together.

example.ex: Down below them was the sea of upturned faces...
example.tran: 他们下面是无数张仰望的脸。

example.ex: His eyes ran over the sea of bottles and glasses on the table.
example.tran: 他扫了一眼满桌的瓶子和玻璃杯。

entry.def: You can say that someone is all at sea when they are in a state of confusion or uncertainty.

example.ex: If you had never seen a telly ad, you would be all at sea with popular culture.
example.tran: 如果你从没看过电视广告，你就搞不懂什么是大众文化。

entry.def: At sea means on or under the sea, far away from land.

example.ex: The boats remain at sea for an average of ten days at a time...
example.tran: 这些船只每次在海上平均航行 10 天。

example.ex: His body was found at sea in waters off the Canary Islands.
example.tran: 他的尸体在离加那利群岛不远的海上被发现。

entry.def: If you go or look out to sea, you go or look across the sea.

example.ex: ...fishermen who go to sea for two weeks at a time...
example.tran: 每次出海两周的渔夫们

means.word_mean: 1. a division of an ocean or a large body of salt water partially enclosed by land
2. anything apparently limitless in quantity or volume
3. turbulent water with swells of considerable size;
1. relating to or characteristic of or occurring on the sea or ships;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sǣ, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zee and German See

sentences.cn: 耶51:42海水涨起、漫过巴比伦. 他被许多海浪遮盖.
sentences.en: The sea has come up over Babylon; She has been engulfed with its tumultuous waves.

sentences.cn: 大海包藏着许多秘密.
sentences.en: The sea contains many mysteries.

sentences.cn: 尽管这枚导弹掉入了海中, 许多共和党人认为这件事显示了奥巴马先生的天真.
sentences.en: Though the missile crashed into the sea, many Republicans think it illuminated Mr Obama's naivet é.

sentences.cn: 孩子们在海边捡到许多贝壳.
sentences.en: The children picked up many sea shells at the seashore.

sentences.cn: 许多英国男孩子想在长大后当海员.
sentences.en: Many British boys want to go to sea when they are old enought.

sentences.cn: 许多的冰掉入海里.
sentences.en: Large pieces of ice fall into the sea.

sentences.cn: 许多小岛分布在海上.
sentences.en: Many isles are scattered in the sea.

sentences.cn: 许多国家在海底开采石油.
sentences.en: Many countries exploit oil under the sea.

sentences.cn: 在纳米比亚与安哥拉和大海的交界处, 仍然有许多猎人和收集者迷失在那些遥远的大山里.
sentences.en: Where Namibia meets both Angola and the sea, hunters and gatherers still wander remote mountains.

sentences.cn: 许多人向往在南海的一个岛上生活.
sentences.en: Many people dream about living on an island in the South Seas.

sentences.cn: 望着那广阔的海面,心情自然宽舒许多!
sentences.en: The broad and limitless sea will surely set your mind at ease.

sentences.cn: 在海上许多月以后, 哥伦布发现了陆地.
sentences.en: After many months at sea, Columbus sighted land.

sentences.cn: 它的许多海景会令你和你的孩子喜悦.
sentences.en: Its many sea attractions will delight you and your children.

sentences.cn: 海水涨起,漫过巴比伦. 她被许多海浪遮盖.
sentences.en: The sea has come up over Babylon; she is covered with the mass of its waves.

sentences.cn: 海洋里有许多诸如鲸鱼和海豹类的海生哺乳动物.
sentences.en: There are lots of marine mammals such as whales and seals in the sea.

sentences.cn: 在那里我看到了许多海洋动物,有海豚 、 海马,还有很多鱼.
sentences.en: I saw many sea animals there, such as the dolphins, sea horses and some fish.

sentences.cn: 许多海鸥在海面上飞翔.
sentences.en: A lot of seagulls are seagulls are flying over the sea.

sentences.cn: 许多男孩都渴望当海员.
sentences.en: Many boys to go to sea.

sentences.cn: 不幸的是,在多维尔和加来之间的海底上搁置有许多沉船.
sentences.en: Unfortunately the sea bed between Dover and Calais holds many wrecks.

sentences.cn: 由于过度捕鱼,许多海洋生物濒于灭绝.
sentences.en: Many sea creatures at the edge of extinction because of overfishing.

sentences.cn: 有些看上了南极现成可用的资源，例如大量的海洋生物。
sentences.en: Some of the ventures focus on the Antarctic  resources  that  are  already  up  for  grabs,  like  abundant sea  life.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这会给我们带来大量的麻烦.
sentences.en: This will give us a sea of troubles.

sentences.cn: 它拥有大量的色彩鲜艳的海上球迷, 软珊瑚和海绵桶.
sentences.en: It boasts plenty of brightly coloured sea fans, soft corals and barrel sponges.

sentences.cn: 海洋因为大量名目繁多的鱼类而充满生机.
sentences.en: The sea is alive with plenty of different kinds of fish.

sentences.cn: 考古学家在比尼亚莱斯山谷中发现了大量恐龙 、 猿猴 、 海龟化石.
sentences.en: Archaeologists at the valley vinales found a large number of dinosaurs, apes, sea turtles fossils.

sentences.cn: 北海里生存着大量的鱼.
sentences.en: Fish abounds in the North Sea.

sentences.cn: 这家工厂意外泄漏大量有毒废物到海中.
sentences.en: The factory had accidentally released a quantity of toxic waste into the sea.

sentences.cn: 海洋能为我们提供大量的淡水.
sentences.en: The sea can provide us with a lot of fresh water.

sentences.cn: 海洋的富饶(大量鱼产).
sentences.en: The prodigality of the sea, ie in providing fish.

sentences.cn: 此后, 海洋生物逐渐丰富起来,海洋里生长着大量移游生物,比如腹足类 、 海胆类和蟹类.
sentences.en: Afterward, the seas became far more complex with mobile creatures such as snails, urchins and crabs.

sentences.cn: 社区官员解释说,大量的“红袖章”会将潜在的违法者吓走.
sentences.en: The sea of red armbands will frighten the potential attackers, the community official explained.

sentences.cn: 捕捞过度导致渤海及其近海水域的鱼类大量减少.
sentences.en: Overfishing has resulted in depleted populations in the Bohai Sea and other coastal waters.

sentences.cn: 死后, 他们的遗骸大量地沉入海底.
sentences.en: On death, their remains rained down to the sea floor.

sentences.cn: 船边涌出大量黑油,流往海中.
sentences.en: The ship's side vomited out a great mass of black oil into the sea.

sentences.cn: 海底发现大量石油和天然气.
sentences.en: Large deposits of oil and gas have been found under the sea.

sentences.cn: 我们需要大量北极海参. 请能提供的卖家与我联系.
sentences.en: We need large quantity of Arctic sea cucumber . If you can supply pl contact me.

sentences.cn: 泄入大海的石油严重危害了大量鸟兽.
sentences.en: The oil which discharged into the sea seriously harmed a lot of birds and animals.

sentences.cn: 河流挟着大量沉积物奔流入海.
sentences.en: Rivers and torrents carried great loads of sediment out to sea.

sentences.cn: 中国需要大量投资淡化海水.
sentences.en: China needs to heavily invest desalinization of sea water.

sentences.cn: 有大量的破坏海洋的业力.
sentences.en: There is much human karma for destruction of the sea.

sentences.cn: 海洋还含有大量的其他物质, 除了盐以外.
sentences.en: The sea contains a large number of substances, besides common salt.

sentences.cn: 近日,山东日照北部近海7月下旬发现的大量漂浮丝状无毒性绿藻被清理完毕,日照市海水浴场逐渐恢复人气.
sentences.en: A large scale of green algae hit the sea area of Rizhao over a week ago.

sentences.cn: 在普吉湾地区, 大量繁殖的石莼经常在大仲马湾腐烂分解.
sentences.en: In Puget Sound, big blooms of sea lettuce often break down in Dumas Bay.

sentences.cn: 北海有大量优质鱼.
sentences.en: Good fish abound in the North Sea.

sentences.cn: 他欠下大量债务.
sentences.en: He ran up a sea of debt.

sentences.cn: 大量海水冲入了船舱，正在船底来回晃荡。
sentences.en: Gallons of sea water had rushed into the cabin and were now swilling about in the bilges.

Sentence.sentence: Nicaraguan naval authorities had banned sea travel in the area because of bad weather and strong winds, but the tour boat proceeded anyway.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Likewise, theimpactof this warming will be very different depending on where you are—coastal areas must worry about rising sea levels, while Siberia and northern Canada may become more habitable (宜居的) andappealingfor humans than these areas are now.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A message in a bottle sent out to sea by a New Hampshire man more than five decades ago was found 1500 miles away and has been returned to his daughter.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: All in all, the Olympic class ships were marvels of sea engineering, but they seemed cursed to suffer disastrous fates.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And it would be great to go somewhere by the sea.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: And so far, this green sea slug is the only known animal that can be truly considered solar-powered, although some animals do exhibit some plant-like behaviors.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: However, these beasts of the sea do display a vast range of highly refined behaviors that appear to be driving their genetic development.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: It is situated on the Mediterranean Sea, and surrounded by France on three sides.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's about an hour outside Seoul, built on reclaimed tidal flats along the Yellow Sea, There's a Coast Guard building and a tall trade tower, as well as a park, golf course and university.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Many scientists have studied the green sea slugs to confirm that they are actually able to create energy from sunlight.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: nicaraguan naval authorities had banned sea travel in the area because of bad weather and strong winds, but the tour boat proceeded anyway.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The sea slugs are so good at gathering energy from the sun that they can live up to nine months without having to eat any food.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Their massive wake creates waves at the bottom of the sea, weakening the foundations of the centuries-old buildings themselves.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Warming waters are known to contribute to coral bleaching and they take up more space than cooler waters, raising sea levels.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: You made day dream about meeting your life partner, or living in a big house by the sea.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
